post:
_Hello everyone_,

FirstHeberg am sharing a new promotion of - 25% 

This concerns the following VPS offers: 

• VPS OpenVZ SSD → from 1.49 € excl taxe/month 
http://bit.ly/1mChu4x 

• VPS KVM SSD → from 3.99€ excl taxe/month
http://bit.ly/1SoFWRL 

• VPS KVM HDD → from 3.99€ excl taxe/month
http://bit.ly/1R3VAlI 

For each offer :
• 1GB RAM minimum
• 100 Mbps of bandwidth 
• 20 GB SSD minimum of disk space.

The reduction is achieved with the promo code: **FEBRUARY25** (excluding renewals) 

With this promotion, you will save a minimum of 0.37€ on offer VPS OpenVZ SSD and a minimum of 1.11 € for offers VPS KVM SSD and VPS KVM HDD.

This website isn’t yet available in English but you can translate it with Google translate. However, the technical support deals requests in English. 

Enjoy it until 18 February inclusive. For information please contact us by email: _commercial@firstheberg.com_

**Team FirstHeberg** wish you a nice day!
